title: Conductor
description: This is a simple metronome app. Open it up, choose a tempo, and your device will vibrate in time to the music.It works on Android Wear too! Open up the app and set a tempo. Or, you can have the app open on both devices. It will mirror the tempo as well as remote start & stop!FEATURES- Material Design- Set a tempo manually or tap to calibrate- Custom time signatures- Properties mirrored between mobile and wearable instantly- Device vibrates and/or plays sounds- Save certain configurations in Presets to return to them later- Supports Chromebooks- Supports Android TV- Supports Android Wear
descriptionHTML:
This is a simple metronome app. Open it up, choose a tempo, and your device will vibrate in time to the music.

It works on Android Wear too! Open up the app and set a tempo. Or, you can have the app open on both devices. It will mirror the tempo as well as remote start & stop!

FEATURES
- Material Design
- Set a tempo manually or tap to calibrate
- Custom time signatures
- Properties mirrored between mobile and wearable instantly
- Device vibrates and/or plays sounds
- Save certain configurations in Presets to return to them later
- Supports Chromebooks
- Supports Android TV
- Supports Android Wear
comments: Nice design Sound and vibration lags behind pretty badly on fast tempos making it pretty much unusable.
Having issues with it opening up with wear 2.0 on Huawei watch.  Clinking on the link open in wear, does nothing.  Can't find it on the phone as well.
recentChanges: Using AppCompat, this app has had a complete UI overhaul. The app now has a smaller file size and at the same time looks more gorgeous than before. Layouts, dialogs, and the app icon have been spruced to give a better experience.
This isn't all of it though...
